definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
crowdsourcing/abbr. to 眾包|众包[zhong4 bao1]

sentences.english: Xi'an city wall is an artificial loess slope composed of inner-soil and outer-brick masonry.
sentences.chinese: 西安明城墙是由内芯土和外包墙组成的人工黄土边坡。

sentences.english: In recent years the researches on the outsourcing business of book-acquisition and cataloguing have become a subject of great interest in China.
sentences.chinese: 近年来我国图书馆业务外包研究成为热门话题。

sentences.english: External conditions of packing at time of discharge. Was there any sign of having been reconditioned?
sentences.chinese: 卸货时外包装情况。有否重新整理的现象？

sentences.english: The product external packing is carton packing.
sentences.chinese: 产品外包装为纸箱包装。

sentences.english: The work of interior design could be outsourced to those professional companies.
sentences.chinese: 室内装修的工作可外包给那些专业装修公司去做。

sentences.english: The outside of your package will only document your order and product numbers.
sentences.chinese: 商品外包装仅会显示收件人资讯与订单编号。

sentences.english: He outsourced the computer department and online customer service to Mumbai and Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 他将电脑部和在线客服业务外包给孟买和班加罗尔。

sentences.english: It would be a disgrace if California outsources this project.
sentences.chinese: 如果加州将这个项目外包，那将是个耻辱。

sentences.english: A good outsourcing decision may bring the enormous benefits to the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 但非，一个功闭于的外包决议计划同样会毁了企业。

sentences.english: We shall try to solve the financing difficulty of service outsourcing enterprises, especially the small- and medium-sized ones.
sentences.chinese: 努力解决服务外包企业特别是中小企业融资难的问题。

sentences.english: I own a small percentage of an engineering outsourcing company in Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 我拥有一个很小的百分比，工程外包公司在武汉。

sentences.english: Do not use string or paper over-wrap.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用绳子或纸质外包装。

sentences.english: Are there any aspects of software development that cannot be off-shored?
sentences.chinese: 软件开发中有无法外包的工作吗？

sentences.english: Why are companies flocking to outsource their cash management?
sentences.chinese: 为什么公司踊跃地将其现金管理外包？

sentences.english: Firstly, senior talents of service outsourcing shall be included in the key talents introduction scope of the whole municipality.
sentences.chinese: 一是将服务外包高级人才纳入全市重点引进人才范围。

sentences.english: Similarly, the type of software development work that is outsourced is also changing.
sentences.chinese: 同样地，被外包的软件开发工作的类型也在变化。

definition: to undertake/to take on (i.e. to accept a task)
to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
